name: Sign Up Flow - MBB 1 Month
description: This test verifies the web sign up flow for MBB 1 month plan
descriptionHtml: This test verifies the web sign up flow for MBB 1 month plan

testStage.description: This test verifies the web sign up flow for MBB 1 month plan

steps.name: Verify that the homepage loaded correctly
Click join us on the homepage
Verify that the service type page has loaded correctly
Select MBB plan in the sign up flow
Verify page header, search bar and map
Enter address, confirm coverage and continue
Verify that the header, title and router image have loaded
Verify header, data card and router card. Select no router and proceed
Verify compatability screen is shown, and continue with no router
Verify that the mbb account creation page has loaded.
Create an account using a randomly generated email
Verify the page that asks whether the delivery should be at the same or different location
Verify delivery details page header and building options
Enter the address details and click continue
Verify MBB header, location card, plan card, address card, and final amount
Agree to terms and proceed to payment
Verify payment page header, credit/debit, google pay and POD
